## Objective
Describe the scientific or operational objective and how it aligns with the current roadmap phase.

## Proposed Scope
- Target repositories / directories
- Expected datasets or telemetry sources
- Dependencies on existing tooling

## Feedback Instrumentation
- Surveys to configure in `web/command-center/analytics`
- Telemetry dashboards to update

## Risks & Mitigations
Reference entries (or add new ones) in `docs/security/RISK_REGISTER.md`.

## Review Cadence
Suggested frequency for cross-functional reviews and owners.
